item.title: 美英汽车关税削减生效，但钢铁关税仍无进展
item.description: 随着美国总统和英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）之间经济协议的首批内容生效，英国汽车制造商从周一开始可以按照 10% 的关税向美国出口汽车，低于唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对其他国家征收的 25% 的关税。【原文：UK car manufacturers can export to the US under a 10% tariff starting Monday, a reduction from the 25% rate imposed by Donald Trump on other countries, as the first elements of an economic agreement between the US president and Prime Minister Keir Starmer come into effect.】

item.title: 欧洲市场越来越难以忽视
item.description: 上半年，以美元计价，欧洲股市的表现超过美国股市，创下历史最大涨幅，这是该地区市场在经历十多年低迷后卷土重来的最显著标志。【原文：European stocks outperformed their US peers by the biggest margin on record in dollar terms during the first half, the most dramatic sign of how the region’s markets are staging a comeback after more than a decade in the doldrums.】

item.title: 英国破纪录的阳光并不都是好消息
item.description:
英国有史以来最温暖、最晴朗的春季可能会让人精神振奋，但同时也带来了挑战。【原文：

One of Britain’s warmest — and sunniest — springs ever may be lifting spirits, but it comes with challenges.

】

item.title: 中国机器人初创企业在备受瞩目的比赛后收获颇丰
item.description: 就在几个月前，Noetix Robotics 还在为其霍比特人大小的机器人苦苦寻找一个客户。创始人江哲源对快速烧光投资者的资金感到紧张。后来，公司的一款 N2 型号机器人在世界首次机器人半程马拉松比赛中获得了第二名。【原文：Just a few months ago, Noetix Robotics was struggling to find a single customer for its Hobbit-sized robots. Founder Jiang Zheyuan was nervous about burning through investors’ money quickly. Then one of its N2 models placed second in the world’s first half-marathon for robots.】

item.title: 外资流入枯竭，印度债券指数势头减弱
item.description: 印度进军全球债务市场需要第二幕。【原文：India’s breakthrough into global debt markets is in need of a second act.】

item.title: 香港建筑商英皇称债务逾期后股价下跌
item.description: 香港开发商英皇国际控股有限公司（Hong Kong developer Emperor International Holdings Ltd.）报告银行贷款逾期未还，并表示正在与银行商讨重组计划，该公司股价周一创下今年以来最大跌幅。【原文：Hong Kong developer Emperor International Holdings Ltd. shares fell the most this year Monday after it reported overdue bank loans and said it’s talking to banks on a restructuring plan.】

item.title: 基金在连续买入 43 天后转为卖出韩国债券
item.description: 由于房价飙升抑制了对央行降息的押注，海外投资者终于对韩国债券产生了厌恶情绪，在经历了近二十年来最长的资金流入期后削减了持有量。【原文：Overseas investors finally soured on South Korean bonds, trimming holdings after the longest run of inflows in almost two decades, as surging house prices damped bets on central bank interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: Medipal 寻求多元化以应对药品利润的缩减
item.description: 日本最大的药品批发商 Medipal Holdings Corp. 正在寻求并购机会，以实现业务多元化，应对市场增长放缓。【原文：Japan’s largest drug wholesaler Medipal Holdings Corp. is seeking merger and acquisition opportunities to diversify its business and counter slower growth in the market.】

item.title: 情绪改善，全球基金可能从印度股市转向中国股市
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 加拿大放弃激怒特朗普的数字税，重启贸易谈判
item.description: 加拿大撤销了对 Meta Platforms 公司和 Alphabet 公司等科技公司征收的数字服务税，此举旨在重启与美国的贸易谈判。【原文：Canada has withdrawn its digital services tax on technology companies such as Meta Platforms Inc. and Alphabet Inc. in a move to restart trade talks with the US.】

item.title: NTT 募集 8.12 亿美元房地产投资信托打破新加坡 IPO 荒
item.description: 日本 NTT 有限公司正寻求在其数据中心房地产投资信托基金的新加坡上市中筹集高达 8.12 亿美元的资金，这有望成为新加坡八年来最大的首次公开募股。【原文：Japan’s NTT Ltd. is seeking to raise as much as $812 million in a Singapore listing of its data center real estate investment trust, in what is poised to be the city-state’s biggest IPO in eight years.】

item.title: 紫金以 12 亿美元收购哈萨克斯坦金矿项目
item.description: 紫金矿业集团股份有限公司（Zijin Mining Group Co.【原文：Zijin Mining Group Co. is set to acquire a gold project in Kazakhstan, underscoring the Chinese company’s ambitious push to expand production of the precious metal.】

item.title: 泰国椰子汁生产商 IFBH 在香港上市后股价大涨
item.description: 泰国椰子汁生产商 IFBH 有限公司在香港首次公开募股 11.6 亿港元（1.48 亿美元），上市首日股价涨幅高达 67%，这是香港股票资本市场重新焕发活力的最新迹象。【原文：Shares of Thai coconut-water maker IFBH Ltd. rose as much as 67% on their first day of trading in Hong Kong following a HK$1.16 billion ($148 million) initial public offering, the latest sign of renewed vigor in the city’s equity capital market.】

item.title: 主要参议员达成协议，五年内暂停实施州人工智能法
item.description: 参议院即将批准一项有争议的条款，阻止美国一些州对人工智能进行监管，这标志着支持该条款的科技公司、风险投资公司和初创企业取得了胜利。【原文：The Senate is poised to approve a controversial provision preventing some US states from regulating artificial intelligence, marking a victory for the tech companies, venture capital firms and startups that backed it.】

item.title: 贸易停战后中国工厂活动降幅再度放缓
item.description: 中国的工厂活动连续第二个月出现改善，但仍处于萎缩状态，原因是与美国的关税战停火后贸易出现反弹，而国内需求疲软对经济造成了压力。【原文：China’s factory activity improved for a second month but remained in contraction, as trade rebounds after the ceasefire in the tariff war with the US while weak domestic demand weighs on the economy.】

item.title: 新西兰就业岗位减少，国内生产总值增长疲软迹象加剧
item.description: 由于全球的不确定性使得雇主们对招聘持谨慎态度，新西兰已填补的工作岗位降至 2023 年初的水平。【原文：New Zealand filled jobs are down to levels last seen in early 2023 as global uncertainty makes employers cautious about hiring.】

item.title: 中国高温酷暑给电网带来夏季考验
item.description: 中国的七月将是一个炎热的开始，在本月的第一周，全国气温将比历史平均气温高出近 3℃。【原文：A sizzling start to July is on the cards for China, where nationwide temperatures are poised to climb almost 3C above historical averages in the first week of the month.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国贸易协议进展，黄金延续跌势
item.description: 黄金在连续两周下跌后走低，白宫希望在7月9日的最后期限前与多个国家敲定贸易协议，风险情绪阻碍了黄金需求。【原文：Gold edged lower after two consecutive weekly declines, with demand impeded by a risk-on mood as the White House aims to finalize trade deals with several nations ahead of a July 9 deadline.】

item.title: 沉浸在收益中的债券交易员押注美联储将助推连胜
item.description: 在上半年结束之际，美国债券交易员们经历了动荡，以某种方式实现了盈利。现在，他们正准备在三周连胜后获得更多收益，而周四的就业报告将成为潜在的催化剂。【原文：US bond traders gutted through turbulence to somehow find themselves notching profits as the first half ends. Now, they’re setting up for more gains following a three-week winning streak, with Thursday’s jobs report as a potential catalyst.】

item.title: 欧力士将向创始人出售 13 亿美元的 Greenko 股份
item.description: 欧力士公司将以 12.8 亿美元的价格把其在 Greenko Energy Holdings 的大部分股份卖回给这家印度清洁能源生产商的创始人。【原文：Orix Corp. will sell most of its stake in Greenko Energy Holdings back to the Indian clean energy producer’s founders for $1.28 billion.】

item.title: 稳定币狂潮推动股票大幅上涨，令基金警惕
item.description: 一些投资者对全球稳定币热潮越来越警惕，因为这股热潮推动了与仍在萌芽中的稳定币技术有关的公司股价大幅上涨。【原文：Some investors are growing wary over the global stablecoin craze that has driven massive gains in shares of companies linked to the still-emerging technology.】

item.title: 受美国关税影响，日本工厂产出不及预期
item.description: 由于美国加征关税打击了日本的出口，日本 5 月份工业生产增幅低于预期，未能达到分析师的预期。【原文：Japan’s industrial production rose less than expected in May, missing analysts’ estimates as the US tariffs hit the nation’s exports.】

item.title: 最后期限临近，特朗普称与 "日本先生 "的汽车贸易不公平
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周日将美国和日本之间的汽车贸易定性为不公平贸易。【原文：US President Donald Trump characterized trade in cars between the US and Japan as unfair on Sunday, little more than a week before higher tariffs are set to kick in if a deal isn’t reached between the two nations.】

item.title: 担心新世界危机的银行家达成 110 亿美元贷款协议
item.description: 没有人愿意成为那个使香港脆弱的房地产市场陷入危机的银行家。【原文：Nobody wanted to be the banker who tipped Hong Kong’s fragile property market into crisis.】

item.title: 欧佩克+会议前交易商回调风险溢价，原油下跌
item.description: 在伊朗和以色列之间达成脆弱的休战协议之后，以及在欧佩克+会议可能再次出现超大规模增产之前，对冲基金纷纷押注看跌，石油创下两年多来的最大单周跌幅，随后下跌。【原文：Oil fell after its biggest weekly loss in more than two years as hedge funds piled into bearish bets following a fragile truce between Iran and Israel, and before an OPEC+ meeting that may see another super-sized production increase.】

item.title: 贸易谈判继续进行，美国期货走高：市场综述
item.description: 美国股市期货在亚洲早盘交易中走高，原因是贸易谈判在7月9日的最后期限前加快了步伐，参议院继续就唐纳德-特朗普总统提出的4.5万亿美元减税方案进行谈判。【原文：US equity futures edged higher in early Asia trading as trade talks gathered pace ahead of a July 9 deadline and Senate negotiations continued over President Donald Trump’s $4.5 trillion tax cut package.】

item.title: 苹果供应商透镜技术公司寻求在香港上市，融资额高达 6.06 亿美元
item.description: 苹果公司的供应商朗思科技有限公司正在寻求在香港上市，融资额高达 48 亿港元（约合 6.06 亿美元），这是最新一家在金融中心寻求第二个交易立足点的中国公司。【原文：Lens Technology Co., a supplier to Apple Inc., is seeking to raise as much as HK$4.8 billion ($606 million) in a Hong Kong listing, the latest Chinese company to seek a second trading foothold in the financial hub.】

item.title: 据说埃利奥特的意大利银行计划收购西斯特马银行
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由 Elliott Management Corp. 控制的意大利金融服务公司 Banca CF+ 将对 Banca Sistema SpA 发起收购要约。【原文：Banca CF+, an Italian financial services firm controlled by Elliott Management Corp., is set to launch an offer for Banca Sistema SpA, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 亚洲银行助推中东地区 20 多亿美元贷款热潮
item.description: 中东借款人正在增加在亚太地区的银团贷款，因为他们希望在全球债券和国内市场之外实现筹资多样化。【原文：Middle East borrowers are ramping up loans that are being syndicated in Asia Pacific as they look to diversify fundraising beyond global bond and domestic markets.】
